visual_assets.name: Court Map (Center Circle)
visual_assets.description: Basketball court diagram focused on the center circle area, showing the tip-off position and transition lanes. Stylized to match the 'Data Court' theme with subtle tech/code elements.
visual_assets.glif_prompt: Basketball court diagram showing center circle, transition lanes, and half-court line. Stylized with subtle tech/digital elements - grid lines, code-like patterns, blue accents. Clean, modern, kid-friendly illustration. Top-down view.

technical_specs.color_scheme: Traditional court colors (wood/tan) with blue accents

key_elements: Transition lanes marked (left lane, right lane, middle)
Subtle grid lines, code-like patterns, digital aesthetic

visual_assets.name: Shadow Press Scouts (Monster Art)
visual_assets.description: Dark, shifting, shadowy figures that create chaos and force turnovers. Menacing but not scary (age-appropriate for grades 3-8).
visual_assets.glif_prompt: Shadowy basketball players, dark shifting figures with tech/code elements visible in their shadows. Menacing but kid-friendly villains. Multiple figures (3-5) creating chaos on a basketball court. Dark colors (black, dark gray, dark purple) with subtle blue tech accents. Athletic, lean silhouettes. Cool video game enemy aesthetic, not scary.

technical_specs.transparency: May need transparent background for overlays

key_elements: Tech/code aesthetic (code fragments visible in shadows)

character_design.features: Minimal facial features (maybe glowing eyes), shadowy form
character_design.color: Primarily dark (blacks, dark grays, dark purples) with subtle blue/tech accents

visual_assets.name: State Diagram (Code Visualization)
visual_assets.description: Visual diagram showing the four states (START, LIVE, DEAD, OUTCOME) and how they transition. Flowchart or state machine diagram, kid-friendly and basketball-themed.
visual_assets.glif_prompt: Flowchart diagram showing four basketball states: START, LIVE, DEAD, OUTCOME. Color-coded boxes with basketball icons. Arrows showing state transitions. Clean, educational, kid-friendly design. Modern flowchart aesthetic with basketball theme.
key_elements: Four boxes/circles representing states: START, LIVE, DEAD, OUTCOME
Basketball-themed icons in each state box
Color coding: START (Yellow/Gold), LIVE (Green), DEAD (Red), OUTCOME (Blue)

generation_instructions.method: Use provided Glif prompts with any AI image generation tool
generation_instructions.api_integration: Can use educational_pipeline.py script if API keys available
generation_instructions.manual_generation: Copy prompts to preferred tool and generate
